citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at approximatley
1:45 pm on 06/24/2015.
The inspector contacted the licensee's family member upon arrival at the facility. He indicated that the licensee was
away from the facility and would not be returning for several hours.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
Note: This inspection report was sent by mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at approximatley
1:45 pm on 06/24/2015.
The inspector contacted the licensee's family member upon arrival at the facility.  He indicated that the licensee was
away from the facility and would not be returning for several hours.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
Note: This inspection report was sent by mail.
